column5: Anyone ever record with the aqua vu with out the dvr they sell as an accesories? Hoping I can use the camcorder. Thanks.

Yeap you can use any thing that had RCA jacks to record.  The one Aqua vu offers is really over priced for what it does. I just use my camera take movies of the screen not as good as direct but cheap and less to carry
The price has come down a lot on the Aqua Vu DVR, now 129 at Leb, I showed BPro and they matched, their regular price is $239, thieves.
